title: Quantum supersymmetric pairs of basic types
abstract:
We formulate and classify super Satake diagrams under a mild assumption,
building on arbitrary Dynkin diagrams for finite-dimensional basic Lie
superalgebras. We develop a theory of quantum supersymmetric pairs associated
to the super Satake diagrams. We establish the quantum Iwasawa decomposition
and construct quasi $K$-matrix associated with the quantum supersymmetric
pairs. We also formulate a Schur duality between an $\imath$quantum supergroup
(which is a new $q$-deformation of an ortho-symplectic Lie superalgebra) and
the $q$-Brauer algebra.
